name: Teamspeak
notes: The installer will display a terminal window to display the license, accept by pressing Q and Y then close the window.
content:
exe: ts3client_runscript.sh
files:
- installer: http://dl.4players.de/ts/releases/3.1.10/TeamSpeak3-Client-linux_amd64-3.1.10.run
installer:
- execute:
    args: --target $GAMEDIR
    file: installer
    terminal: true
